results.content: Finally, someone talking through and explaining things passed intro level. So much content too!
results.content_html: Finally, someone talking through and explaining things passed intro level. So much content too!

results.content:
First off, I liked the course and thought it was very useful.  

I think 2 videos on installation of MongoDB would of been very useful (not essential, but probably would be very helpful for most students). And also, providing the “restaurant” collection so I could code along with the videos.  If the “restaurant” collections was in the course material, I didn’t find it.  Maybe show where it is in one of the installation videos I talk about above, “We use this collections in almost all the videos and this is the best way to access it...”
results.content_html:
First off, I liked the course and thought it was very useful.

I think 2 videos on installation of MongoDB would of been very useful (not essential, but probably would be very helpful for most students). And also, providing the “restaurant” collection so I could code along with the videos. If the “restaurant” collections was in the course material, I didn’t find it. Maybe show where it is in one of the installation videos I talk about above, “We use this collections in almost all the videos and this is the best way to access it...”
